subject: Football
Retirement
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Kansas City Chiefs lineman Kyle Turley has risked the ire of the N.F.L. players union to raise awareness for retired N.F.L. players who have been financially and physically devastated by injuries.
snippet: Kansas City Chiefs lineman Kyle Turley has risked the ire of the N.F.L. players union to raise awareness for retired N.F.L. players who have been financially and physically devastated by injuries.
